nodes.text: Security Hub 771 was a security station located at the Power Junction 353 of Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Kaliyo Djannis and the Alliance Commander wired an Ion grenade into the Junction and disabled the Security Hub in preparation for their assault on the Overwatch.
Security Hub 771 appears on Zakuul during Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise of the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion.
